title: Reflections upon the conduct of human life with reference to the study of learning and knowledge : in a letter to the excellent lady, the Lady Masham / by John Norris ... ; to which is annex'd a visitation sermon, by the same author.
author: Norris, John, 1657-1711.
notes: "A sermon preach'd in the Abby Church of Bath" has special t.p., with imprint: London, 1690.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
